command.orbital_railgun_enhanced.help:
Available commands:
/ore radius <value> - Set the sound radius
/ore debug <true|false> - Toggle debug mode
/ore strikeDamage <value> - Set strike damage
/ore cooldown <value> - Set cooldown in ticks
/ore maxStrikes <value> - Set max active strikes
/ore particles <true|false> - Toggle particles
/ore reload - Reload configuration
/ore help - Show this help message
